apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, this emoji portrays a tender moment between two women, with skin tones depicted in a medium-light and dark shade, rendered with Apple's signature soft rounded edges and realistic lighting. The glossy 3D shading accentuates the gentle inclination of their heads and the subtle blush on their cheeks, conveying warmth and affection. This depiction on Apple devices is a beautiful representation of love and connection between women, often used to celebrate relationships and express romantic feelings.
